oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Chris Wallin - 2018-02-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriter Chris Wallin from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 10, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chris Wallin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments and songwriter introduction by Sara Lederach / (02:41) Opening comments by Chris / (03:43) Intros the next song / (05:30) Performs Love Me If You Can / (08:46) Intros the next song / (10:12) Performs Needle Meet The Vein / (13:51) Intros his next song / (15:58) Performs People Loving People / (19:25) Talks about his background and introduces the next song / (20:33) Performs Something To Be Proud Of / (25:03) Answers question about the type of guitar he's playing / (26:01) Answers question about lyrics or music coming first / (26:44) Introduces the next song / (27:19) Performs Barn Burns Down / (30:18) Intros the next song / (31:12) Performs I'm Trying / (35:20) Talks about the last song / (36:37) Talks about the next song / (38:35) Performs unidentified song likely titled People Where I'm From / (42:07) Intros the next song / (42:35) Performs Don't Blink / (45:41) Closing comments / (45:59) Walk-out music / (46:59) FILE ENDS
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wallin, Chris; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
